itemListElement.name: Almond Milk Ice Creams Review. Chocolate Ice cream Quinoa Oat Cookies. vegan glutenfree

@graph.name: Chocolate Quinoa Oat Muffin Top cookies
@graph.description: A cookie recipe made with Almond Milk ice cream.  Vegan and glutenfree
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup cooked Quinoa (I used fair trade rainbow quinoa)
3-4 Tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent sweetener (4 Tbsp for sweeter)
1 Tablespoon organic canola oil or virgin coconut oil (I used organic canola)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the icecream and combine with sugar/sweetener and oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the icecream and combine with sugar/sweetener and oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cooked and cooled quinoa and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cooked and cooled quinoa and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix the Oats, baking powder and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix the Oats, baking powder and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this to the wet mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Add this to the wet mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix to make a thick muffin batter (not stiff dough) kind of consistency. Add more ground Oats if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix to make a thick muffin batter (not stiff dough) kind of consistency. Add more ground Oats if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a large spoon, drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet. The mixture will spread a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a large spoon, drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet. The mixture will spread a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands and shape if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands and shape if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until the center is not jiggly or wet to touch.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until the center is not jiggly or wet to touch.
